data.name: Sleeping Dogs: Square Enix Character Pack
data.detailed_description:
Become a silent assassin, augmented warrior or king of chaos! Wei Shen dons new disguises in this pack, with three new outfits and three new weapons from Square Enix's Hitman, Just Cause and Deus Ex games. Each outfit includes its own buff and signature weapon.


  • The Hitman outfit: Agent 47’s suit grants you reduced attention from the police and comes with a silenced weapon. Assassinate your enemies with stealth, Hitman style.
  • The Deus Ex outfit: The Sarif Industries armor reduces gunfire damage by 33% and comes with a futuristic, fully automatic combat rifle. This technology really is decades ahead of its time.
  • The Just Cause outfit: The Rico Rodriguez custom outfit allows you to hijack vehicles from a greater distance. Liberate those drivers at high speed!
data.about_the_game:

  • The Deus Ex outfit: The Sarif Industries armor reduces gunfire damage by 33% and comes with a futuristic, fully automatic combat rifle. This technology really is decades ahead of its time.
  • The Just Cause outfit: The Rico Rodriguez custom outfit allows you to hijack vehicles from a greater distance. Liberate those drivers at high speed!
data.short_description: Become a silent assassin, augmented warrior or king of chaos! Wei Shen dons new disguises in this pack, with three new outfits and three new weapons from Square Enix's Hitman, Just Cause and Deus Ex games. Each outfit includes its own buff and signature weapon.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 2GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 15GB
  • Video Card: DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Sound: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4GB
  • Hard Disk Space: 15GB
  • Video Card: DirectX 11 Nvidia or AMD ATI card, Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or ATI Radeon 6950
  • DirectX®: 11
  • Sound: DirectX compatible sound card
